signature: void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding or merging maps into the composite map, requiring similar state changes.
Both methods handle key-value pairs, though putAll handles multiple pairs at once.
After calling putAll, the size of the composite map should increase by the number of entries added, making size() a useful method for verifying the result.
Verifying that the keys from the added map are now present in the composite map can confirm the success of putAll.
